ovdesc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) reported in a Account Statement on a particular date, for Statement Cycles greater than 1.

desc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) reported
in Account Statements for Cycles greater than 1 on a particular date.
For Cycle No.2, Key of this table would have two components separated by a ".", the first component being a valid Account record key and the second component being a Date in the format YYYYMMDD.

For Cycle Nos. greater than 2 and upto 9, Key of this table would have three components: The first component being a valid Account record key, the second component being the Account Statement Cycle No. and the third component being a Date in the format YYYYMMDD. The first and second components would be separated by a "."; the second and third components would be separate by a "-".
ID of the STMT.ENTRY record reported in the Account Statement for Cycles greater than 1.
